title: Circle of the Land
content: th.The Ally becomes Resistant to all damage except psychic damage, and disease and poison no longer have any effect.10 TurnsMelee Plant Growth Lv 3 Transmutation ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their Movement Speed quartered.18m 6m Protection from Energy Lv 3 Abjuration ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage.Melee Concentration Sleet
